verses.text_plain: Afterward he brought me again unto the door of the house; and, behold, waters issued out from under the threshold of the house eastward: for the forefront of the house stood toward the east, and the waters came down from under from the right side of the house, at the south side of the altar.
verses.verse_html: 1Afterward he brought me again unto the door of the house; and, behold, waters issued out from under the threshold of the house eastward: for the forefront of the house stood toward the east, and the waters came down from under from the right side of the house, at the south side of the altar.

verses.text_plain: Then brought he me out of the way of the gate northward, and led me about the way without unto the utter gate by the way that looketh eastward; and, behold, there ran out waters on the right side.
verses.verse_html: 2Then brought he me out of the way of the gate northward, and led me about the way without unto the utter gate by the way that looketh eastward; and, behold, there ran out waters on the right side.

verses.text_plain: And when the man that had the line in his hand went forth eastward, he measured a thousand cubits, and he brought me through the waters; the waters were to the ankles.
verses.verse_html:
3And when the man that had the line in his hand went forth eastward, he measured a thousand cubits, and he brought me through the waters; the waters were to the ankles. ▼
▼ the waters were…: Heb. waters of the ankles

footnotes.body_text: ▼ the waters were…: Heb. waters of the ankles
footnotes.body_html: ▼ the waters were…: Heb. waters of the ankles

verses.text_plain: Again he measured a thousand, and brought me through the waters; the waters were to the knees. Again he measured a thousand, and brought me through; the waters were to the loins.
verses.verse_html: 4Again he measured a thousand, and brought me through the waters; the waters were to the knees. Again he measured a thousand, and brought me through; the waters were to the loins.

verses.text_plain: Afterward he measured a thousand; and it was a river that I could not pass over: for the waters were risen, waters to swim in, a river that could not be passed over.
verses.verse_html:
5Afterward he measured a thousand; and it was a river that I could not pass over: for the waters were risen, waters to swim in, a river that could not be passed over. ▼
▼ waters to…: Heb. waters of swimming

tokens.text: that could not be passed over

footnotes.body_text: ▼ waters to…: Heb. waters of swimming
footnotes.body_html: ▼ waters to…: Heb. waters of swimming

verses.text_plain: And he said unto me, Son of man, hast thou seen this? Then he brought me, and caused me to return to the brink of the river.
verses.verse_html: 6And he said unto me, Son of man, hast thou seen this? Then he brought me, and caused me to return to the brink of the river.

tokens.text: me, and caused me to return

verses.text_plain: Now when I had returned, behold, at the bank of the river were very many trees on the one side and on the other.
verses.verse_html:
7Now when I had returned, behold, at the bank of the river were very many trees on the one side and on the other. ▼
▼ bank: Heb. lip

verses.text_plain: Then said he unto me, These waters issue out toward the east country, and go down into the desert, and go into the sea: which being brought forth into the sea, the waters shall be healed.
verses.verse_html:
8Then said he unto me, These waters issue out toward the east country, and go down into the desert, and go into the sea: which being brought forth into the sea, the waters shall be healed. ▼
▼ desert: or, plain

verses.text_plain: And it shall come to pass, that every thing that liveth, which moveth, whithersoever the rivers shall come, shall live: and there shall be a very great multitude of fish, because these waters shall come thither: for they shall be healed; and every thing shall live whither the river cometh.
verses.verse_html:
9And it shall come to pass, that every thing that liveth, which moveth, whithersoever the rivers shall come, shall live: and there shall be a very great multitude of fish, because these waters shall come thither: for they shall be healed; and every thing shall live whither the river cometh. ▼
▼ rivers: Heb. two rivers

tokens.text: and there shall be a very
thither: for they shall be healed

footnotes.body_html: ▼ rivers: Heb. two rivers

verses.text_plain: And it shall come to pass, that the fishers shall stand upon it from En–gedi even unto En–eglaim; they shall be a place to spread forth nets; their fish shall be according to their kinds, as the fish of the great sea, exceeding many.
verses.verse_html: 10And it shall come to pass, that the fishers shall stand upon it from En–gedi even unto En–eglaim; they shall be a place to spread forth nets; their fish shall be according to their kinds, as the fish of the great sea, exceeding many.

tokens.text: shall be according to their kinds

verses.text_plain: But the miry places thereof and the marishes thereof shall not be healed; they shall be given to salt.
verses.verse_html:
11But the miry places thereof and the marishes thereof shall not be healed; they shall be given to salt. ▼
▼ shall not…: or, and that which shall not be healed

footnotes.body_text: ▼ shall not…: or, and that which shall not be healed
footnotes.body_html: ▼ shall not…: or, and that which shall not be healed

verses.text_plain: And by the river upon the bank thereof, on this side and on that side, shall grow all trees for meat, whose leaf shall not fade, neither shall the fruit thereof be consumed: it shall bring forth new fruit according to his months, because their waters they issued out of the sanctuary: and the fruit thereof shall be for meat, and the leaf thereof for medicine.
verses.verse_html:
12And by the river upon the bank thereof, on this side and on that side, shall grow all trees for meat, whose leaf shall not fade, neither shall the fruit thereof be consumed: it shall bring forth new fruit according to his months, because their waters they issued out of the sanctuary: and the fruit thereof shall be for meat, and the leaf thereof for medicine. ▼
▼ shall grow: Heb. shall come up
 , ▼
▼ new: or, principal
 , ▼
▼ for medicine: or, for bruises and sores

tokens.text: thereof, on this side and on that side, shall grow
it shall bring forth new fruit

footnotes.body_text: ▼ shall grow: Heb. shall come up
footnotes.body_html: ▼ shall grow: Heb. shall come up

footnotes.body_text: ▼ for medicine: or, for bruises and sores
footnotes.body_html: ▼ for medicine: or, for bruises and sores

verses.text_plain: Thus saith the Lord God; This shall be the border, whereby ye shall inherit the land according to the twelve tribes of Israel: Joseph shall have two portions.
verses.verse_html: 13Thus saith the Lord God; This shall be the border, whereby ye shall inherit the land according to the twelve tribes of Israel: Joseph shall have two portions.

verses.text_plain: And ye shall inherit it, one as well as another: concerning the which I lifted up mine hand to give it unto your fathers: and this land shall fall unto you for inheritance.
verses.verse_html:
14And ye shall inherit it, one as well as another: concerning the which I lifted up mine hand to give it unto your fathers: and this land shall fall unto you for inheritance. ▼
▼ lifted…: or, swore

verses.text_plain: And this shall be the border of the land toward the north side, from the great sea, the way of Hethlon, as men go to Zedad;
verses.verse_html: 15And this shall be the border of the land toward the north side, from the great sea, the way of Hethlon, as men go to Zedad;

verses.text_plain: Hamath, Berothah, Sibraim, which is between the border of Damascus and the border of Hamath; Hazar–hatticon, which is by the coast of Hauran.
verses.verse_html:
16Hamath, Berothah, Sibraim, which is between the border of Damascus and the border of Hamath; Hazar–hatticon, which is by the coast of Hauran. ▼
▼ Hazar–hatticon: or, the middle village

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Hazar–hatticon: or, the middle village

verses.text_plain: And the border from the sea shall be Hazar–enan, the border of Damascus, and the north northward, and the border of Hamath. And this is the north side.
verses.verse_html: 17And the border from the sea shall be Hazar–enan, the border of Damascus, and the north northward, and the border of Hamath. And this is the north side.

verses.text_plain: And the east side ye shall measure from Hauran, and from Damascus, and from Gilead, and from the land of Israel by Jordan, from the border unto the east sea. And this is the east side.
verses.verse_html:
18And the east side ye shall measure from Hauran, and from Damascus, and from Gilead, and from the land of Israel by Jordan, from the border unto the east sea. And this is the east side. ▼
▼ from (Hauran, Damascus, Gilead, the land): Heb. from between

footnotes.body_text: ▼ from (Hauran, Damascus, Gilead, the land): Heb. from between
footnotes.body_html: ▼ from (Hauran, Damascus, Gilead, the land): Heb. from between

verses.text_plain: And the south side southward, from Tamar even to the waters of strife in Kadesh, the river to the great sea. And this is the south side southward.
verses.verse_html:
19And the south side southward, from Tamar even to the waters of strife in Kadesh, the river to the great sea. And this is the south side southward. ▼
▼ strife: or, Meribah
 , ▼
▼ river: or, valley
 , ▼
▼ is the south side southward: or, is the south side toward Teman

footnotes.body_text: ▼ is the south side southward: or, is the south side toward Teman
footnotes.body_html: ▼ is the south side southward: or, is the south side toward Teman

verses.text_plain: The west side also shall be the great sea from the border, till a man come over against Hamath. This is the west side.
verses.verse_html: 20The west side also shall be the great sea from the border, till a man come over against Hamath. This is the west side.

verses.text_plain: So shall ye divide this land unto you according to the tribes of Israel.
verses.verse_html: 21So shall ye divide this land unto you according to the tribes of Israel.

tokens.text: unto you according to the tribes

verses.text_plain: And it shall come to pass, that ye shall divide it by lot for an inheritance unto you, and to the strangers that sojourn among you, which shall beget children among you: and they shall be unto you as born in the country among the children of Israel; they shall have inheritance with you among the tribes of Israel.
verses.verse_html: 22And it shall come to pass, that ye shall divide it by lot for an inheritance unto you, and to the strangers that sojourn among you, which shall beget children among you: and they shall be unto you as born in the country among the children of Israel; they shall have inheritance with you among the tribes of Israel.

tokens.text: it by lot for an inheritance
unto you, and to the strangers
you: and they shall be unto you as born

verses.text_plain: And it shall come to pass, that in what tribe the stranger sojourneth, there shall ye give him his inheritance, saith the Lord God.
verses.verse_html: 23And it shall come to pass, that in what tribe the stranger sojourneth, there shall ye give him his inheritance, saith the Lord God.
